mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EMP ORDER BY EMP_NO ASC
SELECT EMP_NO, NM, ADDR, HP, POST_NO, ADDR2 ,PKG_CRYPTO.DECRYPT(PASSWORD) AS PASSWORD FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO EMP A USING DUAL ON(A.EMP_NO = #{empNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.NM=#{nm}, A.ADDR=#{addr}, A.HP=#{hp} , A.POST_NO=#{postNo}, A.ADDR2=#{addr2} , A.PASSWORD=PKG_CRYPTO.ENCRYPT(#{password}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(EMP_NO, NM, ADDR, HP, POST_NO, ADDR2, PASSWORD) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(EMP_NO)),0)+1 FROM EMP) ,#{nm},#{addr},#{hp},#{postNo},#{addr2} ,PKG_CRYPTO.ENCRYPT(#{password}) )
